greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Primes in the order that they appear in A280408, without repetitions.
mathematica: DeleteDuplicates@ Flatten@ Table[Select[NestWhileList[If[EvenQ@ #, #/2, 3 # + 1] &, n, # > 1 &], PrimeQ], {n, 200}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Jan 02 2017 *)
results.author: _Matthew Campbell_, Jan 02 2017
